attributes.action: seriously consider harsher punishments for religious fanatics/extremists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to ask the "powers that be", when are you going to sling all the muslim extremist hate-mongers out of this once beautiful country and say "Enough's enough! You're no longer going to get handouts, housing or free education/healthcare etc. that you're not entitled to... We don't like the way you're taking advantage of our country, or stirring up hate and resentment amongst it's populace!!" Because if you don't do something about it Mr. Brown, the people will put into power someone who will... and look what happened last time.
